text:
Hey Charlie! Thanks for sending these over. I'll have a proper look this week. Is there any specific advice you would like from me?  Noticed that you mentioned about focal point, was that for all of the images or just the first one? To clarify how many projects are these imgs from?
Ah you are on the head of the curve so to speak, we've just started recently setting up an unreal department. Definitely were things are heading.
